MAKE A RESERVATION

ABOUT US

私たちに関しては

Where it all began?

Our founder, Charlie Doe, had an idea to create a restaurant that was more than a place that served great food. Charlie wanted to give locals a place where they'd always feel at home. A place where they could get no-nonsense food at down-to-earth prices, and where they'd be treated right by people who had a passion to serve.

OUR VISION

ビジョン

Never pretentious. Always satisfying

We're loved for our hand-breaded Boneless Buffalo Wings, our signature Broiled Sirloin Tips, our famous tall, frosted mugs of beer and more. All are served in a distinctly hearty New England style, enjoyed over good times with great family and friends. Simple, honest, genuine food.

CHEF'S KITCHEN

チーフキッチン

A little Sneak Peak into the Chef's culinary world

We use the most pristine utensils to cook our food in, the finest ingredients all wholesome and fresh.This is what keeps us apart from the others.

Every step of the food-making process is fun filled and cumbersome at the same time, but every element on the plate contains all the love the chef puts into the dish

CHEF'S SPECIAL

シェフのスペシャル

Gauranteed to give your taste buds a tingle!

Some of the customer favourites and Chef's favourites all in one slideshow, Ever the temptation. Have a bite and we assure you that heaven is in the same dimension
